about_the_game:
Space Tourist is a cosy space exploration game. Get ready to visit the Serene Nebula where you will visit planets, plant flags, take photos and relax.

What to Expect In the Demo


  • 200 Star Systems: Embark on a journey across 200 star systems. Each one offers unique planets to explore, all rotating and orbiting around the local star.
  • Photographic Journey: Capture up to 20 stunning photos of the most breathtaking views.
  • Flag Planting: Experience the joy of discovery by planting flags on each new planet you visit, marking your adventure and leaving a personal touch.

    Planned Features for the Full Release:


    • Enhanced User Interface: Streamlined and user-friendly interface improvements for a more immersive experience.
    • Advanced Player Movement: Smoother and more responsive controls
    • Atmospheric Planets: Discover planets with atmospheres.
    • Moons and Oceans: Explore planets with moons and improved ocean visuals, adding depth and variety to your journey.
    • Outpost Building: In the full game, you'll be able to establish a permanent outpost on your favourite planet, creating a personal haven in the stars.


    Why Play the Demo?


    The Space Tourist Demo is your perfect opportunity to experience the serene and cozy adventure that awaits in the full game. Whether you're a seasoned space enthusiast or new to cosmic exploration, this demo will provide a calming and captivating glimpse into a universe filled with wonder and beauty.

name: Space Tourist Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 4th gen i5 2.5 Ghz or AMD FX8350 4.0 Ghz or better
  • Graphics: AMD 7970 or nVidia 770 or better
  • Storage: 234 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Space Tourist is cosy space exploration game. Visit Planets. Plant Flags. Take Photos. Relax. Claim your Serene Nebula Tourist Permit! Your Permit allows you a one-time entry into each of the 200 star systems in the Nebula.
